task.title: How to archive or delete emails
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to delete or archive mails.

context.p: You will learn how to clean your inbox.
Now you will have a clearer view of your desired mails.
Archived email move out of your inbox but stay under All mail, so that you can find them later. Deleted email move to the Trash and get permanently deleted after 30 days.

step.cmd: Click on the select box on the mail you wish to select
At the top, click Archive or Delete.
You can point to a single email and click Archive or Delete.

result.p: You have successfully deleted and archived your desired mails.

example.p: You can clean your unwanted mail so that your inbox is not full.
